title: 2019 NBA Free Agency Live Reactions: Hour 1 | The Ringer NBA Show
description:
The Ringer NBA crew gives instant reactions to the first wave of free-agency signings.
Watch on The Ringer’s YouTube channel.

Host: John Gonzalez
Guest: Kevin O’Connor

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
